dc_title_s: England and Wales: drawn from the most accurate surveys containing all the cities boroughs market towns & villages; in which are included all the improvements and observations both astronomical and topographical, which have been made by members of the Royal Society & others down to the present year.; The whole corrected & improv'd by John Rocque ...
dc_description_s: Dated from the earliest atlas in which the map was issued. Inset map showing the Isles of Scilly. Title cartouche depicts Britannia, angels, a lion and symbols of the arts and sciences; sea decorated with ships. Shows boundaries, roads with distances, rivers, woods and settlements. Relief shown pictorially. London meridian. 1 map: 4 plates; 118 x 99 cm. This map is in the public domain. Please attribute access and use of this digitized map to the Stephen S. Clark Library, University of Michigan Library.
